message: Let's start fair. I'm willing to take the bigger share, but I'm open to negotiating.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going to give you all the power!
Let's split it down the middle this time. We both lose money with every round, so it makes sense to compromise.
I'm not willing to split it 50/50. I need to get a better deal before it's too late!
We're running out of time. Let's try to be reasonable and find a solution that benefits us both. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share than 50/50.
I'm not going to give you a majority share. I need to get a good deal before the money becomes worthless!
Okay, I'm getting the feeling we're not going to agree on an even split. I'm willing to take a smaller share this time to try and get this done before we both lose everything.
